bioconda.name: bioconductor-refplus
bioconda.summary: A function set for the Extrapolation Strategy (RMA+) and Extrapolation Averaging (RMA++) methods.

biotools.summary: The package contains functions for pre-processing Affymetrix data using the RMA+ and the RMA++ methods.

bioschemas.name: RefPlus
bioschemas.summary: The package contains functions for pre-processing Affymetrix data using the RMA+ and the RMA++ methods.
